column5: Hello  From my family to yours,  HAVE A SAFE AND HAPPY THANKSGIVINGS  ALL THE BEST  DAVE AND THE MASSE FAMILY
Maybe at some point in time today we can all look around us and truly understand how thankfull we should be for all we have!!,,,Happy thanksgiving everyone!
LOL... I said, I was taking the day off to make a turkey with my family, but I couldnt help but look in on my family.... if ya know what I mean.. Happy Thanksgiving everyone!
TJ  Thanks to you and your team for another great year on OFC  Best regards  Dave
